text: We need people w/ #cancer in #COVID19 #vaccine #clinicaltrials. They are by def high-risk for severe illness with #SARSCoV2. Their immune function may be ⬇️ by chemo or ⬆️ by #ImmunoOnc. We need formal data on efficacy, safety, & optimal timing r/t tx in our #OncTwitter patients. https://t.co/Kybgk0sZeq
